Title: Enacts the "save our stores act"
Summary: Waives the assessment of fines or monetary penalties against a not-for-profit organization, school, place of worship or small business located in a city with a population of one million or more by a state or local agency for a violation of law, rule, regulation or executive order during the COVID-19 covered period; provides exceptions.
ActClause: AN ACT to enact the "save our stores act"
